conversations.content: How many appointments do I have today?

<function_thought>
To determine how many appointments Emma has today, I will first obtain the current date using the `get_current_day` function. This date will then be used to retrieve the list of appointments scheduled for that day using the `get_day_calendar_events` function.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_current_day()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>

</function_thought>
